spot.name: Hobbiton
spot.info: The starting point, pretty cool place.

res.name: Selfie with the guys
res.story: Leaving the shire, to go on an adventure.

res.name: A song for the road
res.story: We are walkin` and walkin` and walkin` again...

res.name: Wraiths
res.story: There were some scary mofos going around on horses looking for the rings, barely escaped, good thing I still have some pipe weed.

res.name: Mr Frodo
res.story: I can`t stand this guy anymore, he keeps going, mr Frodo this, mr Frodo that, so needy man, what the hell.

res.name: Gollum
res.story: I was attacked by a ghoul, that could talk, it was really strange. He was talking about a precios or something, damn beasts.

res.name: Getting rid of the ring.
res.story: Finally threw the damn ring, and got rid of the ghoul looking strage guy with it, almost died though... just want my pipe.
